remarks: Membership in a class abstraction involving a subset.  Unlike ~ elabg , ` A ` does not have to be a set.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Aug-2006.)
statement:
elssabg.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
elssabg $p |- ( B e. V -> ( A e. { x | ( x C_ B /\ ph ) } <-> ( A C_ B /\ ps ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ps x $.
